purpose: To extend the functionality of Xiaomi smart speakers by allowing them to recognize and respond to custom voice commands.
principle: Builds on Rust to interface with Xiaomi smart speaker hardware, utilizing custom voice command recognition and processing.
reusability: Designed as a standalone application that can be deployed on compatible devices to enhance Xiaomi smart speaker capabilities.
limitations: Requires specific Xiaomi hardware; functionality may vary based on device firmware; primarily supports Mandarin language.
name: open-xiaoai
description: 让小爱音箱「听见你的声音」，解锁无限可能。
highlight: Enables Xiaomi smart speakers to recognize and respond to custom voice commands, expanding their functionality beyond default capabilities.
